channel.title: installing on PraxisLIVE Unofficial Guide

item.title: Tutorial 1 - Our first project
item.description: Welcome to this second part of this PraxisLIVE tutorial series! In this new episode we’re going to install the software, start a new project and play a little with some nodes. SETUP Regardless your OS (Windows, MacOS or Linux, just go to the website and download the software. Just for Linux, if your distro is not Debian-based, you have to install dpkg on your system and run the following command:
